raw: Download and Isle of Wight festivals cancelled due to coronavirus .
replaced: Download and Isle of Wight  Dot festival cancelled due to coronavirus .

raw: Isle of Wight and Download festivals , two of the first major events in the UK ’s summer music calendar , have cancelled their 2020 events due to Covid-19 .
replaced: Isle of Wight  Isle of Wight and Download festivals , two of the first major events in the UK ’s summer music calendar  Download festivals , two of the first major events in the UK ’s summer music calendar , have cancelled  Isle of Wight and Download festivals , two of the first major events in the UK ’s summer music calendar 2020 events due to Covid-19 .

raw: The Isle of Wight festival organisers said it was “ unavoidable given the current status ” of the outbreak , while Download offered “ heartfelt apologies ” .
replaced: The Isle of Wight festival organisers said cancelled was “ unavoidable given the current status ” of the outbreak , while Download offered “ heartfelt apologies ” .

raw: Ticket holders for each event are entitled to refunds , or to carry over their ticket to 2021 .
replaced: Ticket holders for each event are entitled to refunds , or to carry over Ticket holders for each event ticket to 2021 .

raw: The 70,000 - capacity Isle of Wight festival was due to host Lewis Capaldi , the Chemical Brothers , Duran Duran , Lionel Richie and more , from 11 - 14 June , while the 80,000 - capacity Download was to welcome headliners Kiss , Iron Maiden and System of a Down the same weekend .
replaced: Dot festival  Isle of Wight festival was due to host Lewis Capaldi , the Chemical Brothers , Duran Duran , Lionel Richie and more , from 11 - 14 June , while Download was to welcome headliners Kiss , Iron Maiden and System of a Down the same weekend .

raw: Music festivals continue to be cancelled due to the outbreak .
replaced: Music festivals continue to be cancelled due to the outbreak .

raw: Adding to Glastonbury , which was cancelled last week , Brighton ’s The Great Escape , Birmingham ’s Supersonic and Radio 1 ’s Big Weekend festival in Dundee have all also been called off .
replaced: Adding to Glastonbury , which was cancelled last week , Brighton ’s The Great Escape , Birmingham ’s Supersonic and Radio 1 ’s Big Weekend festival in Dundee have all also been called off .

raw: This Is Tomorrow festival has been postponed until 14 - 16 August from its original date of 22 - 24 May , as has Liverpool ’s Sound City , from 1 - 3 May to 25 - 27 September .
replaced: Dot festival has been postponed until 14 - 16 August from Dot festival original date of 22 - 24 May , as has Liverpool ’s Sound City , from 1 - 3 May to 25 - 27 September .

raw: Another looming event , All Points East festival – taking place over numerous dates from 22 to 31 May in London ’s Victoria Park – has not yet been cancelled , but is expected to be , as is the three - city Dot to Dot festival from 22 - 24 May. Parklife and Lovebox festivals , due the same weekend as Download and Isle of Wight , have also not yet been called off .
replaced: Another looming event , All Points East festival – taking place over numerous dates from 22 to 31 May in London ’s Victoria Park – has not yet been cancelled , but is expected to be , as is the three - city Dot to Dot festival from 22 - 24 May.
